content.p: With the 'recent' birth of WEB 3.0. At KLUTZ we want to introduce a new trend in the market. How many times have we had to re-design a product because the final result did not convince us? We wanted to address this problem in emerging or established businesses with ambiguous design systems. At KLUTZ we wish to implement an AI-based design and assembly platform with state-of-the-art technology and at the same time provide a bespoke in-house production and manufacturing service.
